definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: For maximum efficiency, frequently accessed tables should have as few extents as possible.
sentences.chinese: 为达到效率最大化，频繁访问的表区段应当越少越好。

sentences.english: I like working in the heart of the studio to maximize the space.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢在工作室的中心工作，最大化利用空间。

sentences.english: Finally, you learned how to interpret the results of a maximization problem.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我们学习了如何解释最大化问题的结果。

sentences.english: JCI standard can guarantee the best realization of customer's benefit.
sentences.chinese: JCI标准的通过更是保证了顾客利益最大化的实现。

sentences.english: Every section of Liberty Plaza is now being maximized for efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 自由广场的每一部分的功效正被最大化。

sentences.english: In this example there is a maximizer around the root dock.
sentences.chinese: 在这个例子中有一个约根码头最大化。

sentences.english: Create a maximizer and add it to the dock model.
sentences.chinese: 创建一个最大化，并将其添加到Dock模式。

sentences.english: It all depends on how dramatic the changes are from the Normal to Maximized state.
sentences.chinese: 它完全取决于从正常到最大化状态更改的程度有多大。

sentences.english: The commission-revenue maximization exchange innovates futures contract.
sentences.chinese: 代办收入最大化交换促成期货合约的创新。

sentences.english: Other considerations include choosing a column that maximizes the performance of joins.
sentences.chinese: 还有一种考虑是选择能最大化联结性能的列。

sentences.english: Our mission is to maximize share-owner value over time.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目标就是持续地实现股东价值的最大化。

sentences.english: Show the profit-maximizing level of output. Show the profit-maximizing price.
sentences.chinese: 标出利润最大化的产量和价格。

sentences.english: The owner maximizes his expected utility under the two constraints.
sentences.chinese: 企业主在两个约束下最大化其预期效用。

sentences.english: The triangles also have cuts on both sides to maximize the light refraction within them.
sentences.chinese: 这些三角形也在两侧切割，以最大化其内的光折射。

sentences.english: For example, a maximization problem can be rewritten as a minimization problem.
sentences.chinese: 例如，最大化问题可以重写为一个最小化问题。

definition: as far as possible/to do one's utmost
guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
to achieve/to implement/to realize/to bring about
to exploit/to make use of/to use/to take advantage of/to utilize
